content: When finishing up a new theorem in mathlib4, some of my freshly-added imports became unused. I only noticed because I manually tried removing them one at a time - neither the mathlib4 branch ci nor vscode-lean4 gave any warnings about this. Is there any way to automatically detect unused imports?
Try #min_imports. Also, if you try to PR your theorem, then CI will detect this.
Aaron Hill has marked this topic as resolved.
